name: Brain Games 3D
description:
Are you smarter than most people? Time to find out!

Play now and prove you're smarter than all the rest!

Brain Games 3D is a new addictive brain game will of puzzles and fun questions to test just how smart you really are! We've got puzzle levels and all types of crazy tricky questions for that big beautiful brain you've got! Play now!

Features:
- Imaginative puzzle mini-games!
- Super tricky teasers!
- Donuts and ducks!
- Toilets and aliens!
- Test your imagination against wild questions now!


Contact us at hello@gamejam.co
